win: 🎉 You called it! That’s a clean win — fortune favors the bold.
🪙🪙 Boom! Two matching coins just made you richer!
✅ Nailed it! The odds bent in your favor this time.
💰 You guessed right and walked away with the winnings!
🤑 Winner! Your coin call was on point. Sweet payout!
lose: ❌ Oof, tough luck — the coins weren’t feeling generous.
😬 No match this time. Maybe the coin gods are sleeping?
📉 You lost the bet — but hey, at least you played!
🙈 Not your lucky flip... the coins disagree with your call.
🪙 Wrong call! The flip flipped on you.
neutral: ⚖️ Triple match! All coins show the same face — it's a push!
🪙🪙🪙 Whoa! All three coins matched. No one wins, no one loses.
😲 A rare triple! This round's a draw.
🔁 It’s a standoff — three of a kind! Balance unchanged.
😮 All coins landed the same — the universe says 'try again'.
